name: Muscle Strengthening Agent(STR)
description: It's a homemade medicine that is similar to mutagenic substances, but concentrates itself in a different direction then normal.  I feel like I can get a stronger body if I take it.

name: Reflex Neuron Activator(DEX)
description: It's a homemade medicine that is similar to mutagenic substances, but concentrates itself in a different direction then normal.  Taking it will give you superhuman reflexes

name: Thought Accelerator(INT)
description: It's a homemade medicine that is similar to mutagenic substances, but concentrates itself in a different direction then normal. I feel as though this will increase my brains capabilities

name: Sensory Enhancer(PER)
description: It's a homemade medicine that is similar to mutagenic substances, but concentrates itself in a different direction then normal. You feel if you take it then you'll get transcendent sensory abilities

name: Genetic Repair Agent
description: A homemade medicine that can repair the damage to your genes from using chemicals to alter your genetic makeup. You feel like you can return to your true self with this

name: Side-Effect Reducing Agent
description: Medicine created to prevent side effects caused by taking drugs to alter your genetic makeup.
